articles.title: Nitish Kumar, Tejashwi Yadav Meet Bihar Governor To Stake Claim: 10 Facts
articles.description: Nitish Kumar marched with Tejashwi Yadav to the Bihar Governor's residence on Tuesday to form a new government, hours after he broke off an alliance with the BJP and resigned as Chief Minister.
articles.content: <li>Nitish Kumar met with his MLAs before coming to his decision on dumping the BJP for a second time. He met with the Governor late this afternoon to hand in his resignation. "I've resigned, and I'v… [+2825 chars]

articles.title: PM Modi's Assets Up By Rs 26 Lakh To Rs 2.23 Crore, Land Holding Donated
articles.description: Prime Minister Narendra Modi owns assets worth over Rs 2.23 crore, mostly as bank deposits, but has no immovable properties as he has donated his share in a piece of land in Gandhinagar, according to his latest disclosure about assets.
articles.content:
PM Modi owns assets worth over Rs 2.23 crore - mostly bank deposits, PM's Office said in latest report

articles.title: China's Spy Ship Still Headed To Sri Lanka Despite "Defer" Request
articles.description: China continues to sail a missile observation and tracking ship to Sri Lanka's port of Hambantota despite a request from Lankan authorities to defer the visit. India has expressed concern about the ship, which can be used to track ballistic missiles.
articles.content:
• At 10 am today, the 23,000-ton Yuan Wang 5 is sailing West off the coast of Indonesia at a speed of 14 knots or 26 kilometres per hour.
  • It is expected to reach in Hambantota on Thursday… [+1504 chars]

articles.description: On August 9, 1942, the biggest mass movement of the Indian freedom struggle was launched. The British launched a brutal crackdown, but the message was clear: they would have to leave India, nothing less was acceptable
